attributes.action: Help ban kaju katli that is not coated in the appropriate silver attire. Thanks.
attributes.background:
Kaju katli is a beautiful Indian sweet which is supposed to be coated in a thin layer of edible silver coating. But recently many people have encountered the local Asian shops selling nude, uncoated kaju katli. This is why i ask you to support this cause and help save the Indian community.
Sahil.
